entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is participating in a spell-casting activity with his friends. He is trying to correct those who are doing the spell wrong.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is Harry's friend and teammate. He says sorry to Harry when he catches his eye.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a student who is participating in the spell-casting activity with her partner Michael Corner. She is doing very well.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: Michael Corner is Ginny's partner in the spell-casting activity. He is either very bad or unwilling to jinx his partner.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: Ernie Macmillan is a student who is participating in the spell-casting activity with his partner. He is flourishing his wand unnecessarily.

entities.name: creevey brothers
entities.description: The Creevey brothers are enthusiastic but erratic and mainly responsible for all the books leaping off the shelves around them.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is a student who is participating in the spell-casting activity. She is patchy and occasionally sends Justin Finch-Fletchley's wand spinning out of his hand.

entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Justin Finch-Fletchley is a student who is participating in the spell-casting activity with Luna Lovegood. His wand is occasionally sent spinning out of his hand by Luna.

entities.name: michael
entities.description: Michael is another name for Michael Corner.

relationships.description: George says sorry to Harry when he catches his eye.
Harry and Ginny are teammates in the spell-casting activity.
Harry and Michael Corner are teammates in the spell-casting activity.
George says sorry to Harry when he catches his eye.
Luna Lovegood and Justin Finch-Fletchley are partners in the spell-casting activity.
